doc.title: Curtiss-n-Ckandy
doc.plot: Curtiss is just an average guy with simple tastes seeking a little oasis from his desert travels - someplace where he can maybe make a few friends and have a glass of juice. When he meets wealthy blonde bombshell Ckandy, it's love at first sight for Curtiss, and understandably so. Ckandy's endearing looks and vacuous intellect win Curtiss over immediately. In the dry desert wastelands of America Curtiss has found a moist and pretty flower. He doesn't mind that Ckandy spells her name funny, or even that her mentally-challenged and over-protective brother named Alphonso follows her everywhere. Throughout the love-filled and enlightening journey embarked upon by these two, we are reminded that love is blind.
